recommended_agents.name: backend-developer
recommended_agents.reason: Rust backend implementation for CLI tool, server, and API endpoints

recommended_agents.name: tech-lead
recommended_agents.reason: Complex architectural decisions around VFS, snapshot system, and synchronization protocol

recommended_agents.name: unit-test-specialist
recommended_agents.reason: Extensive test coverage with Insta snapshots and Criterion benchmarks needed

recommended_agents.name: code-reviewer
recommended_agents.reason: Rust safety guarantees and performance-critical code paths require careful review

recommended_agents.name: ci-cd-engineer
recommended_agents.reason: Cross-platform Rust builds for Windows, macOS, and Linux with plugin deployment

notes: Rojo is a sophisticated Rust CLI tool for Roblox development with a multi-threaded server, WebSocket sync protocol, and complex snapshot/patch system. Focus on async/concurrency patterns, Roblox DOM manipulation, and filesystem abstraction.
